main event: A civilian in Fort Smith, Arkansas, observed a round, mirror-like object flying at an altitude of 5,000-7,000 feet for about 1 minute before it disappeared behind a row of trees.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a nickel held at arm's length and was estimated to be traveling at a speed of 400MPH.
There were no sound or odor associated with the object, and no trail was seen behind it.
Weather conditions were clear with good visibility at the time of the sighting.
The observer, a U.S. Post Office special delivery carrier, was deemed to be a credible witness with an excellent reputation.
The observer also pointed out the object to other witnesses in the area who have not provided any additional reports of the sighting.
sighted object: round, mirror-like UFO at an altitude of 5,000-7,000 feet
witnesses: civilian observer, U.S. Post Office special delivery carrier
